DOC.brief_title: Dietary Intervention Varying Physical Activity Seniors
DOC.detailed_description: Our target population include 75 overweight obese ( BMI > /= 25kg/m^2 ) woman age 65 80 . This study use parallel-arm design . After block age BMI , 75 overweight obese ( BMI ≥ 25 kg/m2 ) old female ( 65 - 80 old ) randomize three group ; PRO CARB diet combine exercise ( PRO+EX ; n=25 , CARB+EX ; n=25 ) PRO ( n=25 ) without exercise 6 month . All group goal lose ~10 % initial body weight . We anticipate adherence rate 80 % ( n = 20 group remain ) . At initiation study , subject weight stable ( within 2 kg ) past 6 mo sedentary ( define < 1h/wk less 2 exercise session per week last 6 month ) . Eligible participant plan live community duration study . Exclusion criterion include chronic disease/condition would permit exercise dietary restriction alter interpretation data . All subject require personal physician clearance prior enrollment . Main outcome variable interest whole body composition , regional body composition , muscle strength endurance quality , physical function , fatigue biomarkers related fatigue .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Female 2 . Overweight obese ( BMI ≥ 25 kg/m2 ) 3 . 6580 year age 4 . English speak 5 . Plan live community duration study ( ~6 month ) 6 . Weight stable ( within 2 kg ) past 6 month 7 . Sedentary ( define < 1 hr/week physical activity le 2 exercise session per week last 6 month ) 8 . Free history diagnosis renal insufficiency disease 9 . Willing obtain physician clearance 10 . Willing randomized treatment group 11 . Free chronic disease/condition would permit exercise dietary restriction alter interpretation data . 12 . Willing meet study requirement randomization 13 . Nonsmoking tobacco use 14 . Able obtain transportation UGA campus 1 . Normal weight ( BMI < 25 kg/m2 ) 2 . Males 3 . Dietary restriction allow consumption beef , require dietary protocol . 4 . Weight loss surgery and/or weight loss medication usage . 5 . Any metal within body claustrophobia precludes MRI assessment . 6 . Minimental state exam score < 25 7 . Recent history unstable CVD 8 . Cancer treatment within last 5 year active cancer 9 . History lung disease COPD severe asthma 10 . Use antiinflammatory steroid medication 11 . History severe arthritis medical condition precludes ability exercise level need study 12 . Current diagnosis history balance disorder 13 . History mental disorder , dementia , clinical depression disorder preclude adherence protocol 14 . Current weight 350 pound great , due weight restriction equipment
